entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 15 cm over southwestern sections. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
